warmup.title: Jumping Rope
warmup.explanation: jump and move your hands like you would do with a rope

warmup.title: PUSH UPS
warmup.explanation: sraight your mack but carefull, dont put your weight on your back

warmup.title: BURPEES
warmup.explanation: do a squat , then on a plank stance then up and jump

warmup.title: SQUATS
warmup.explanation: watch your knees have to be behince your foot fingers

exercises.title: jab -straight right -left hook -roll
exercises.explanation: Dont over extend the elbow, use ur shoulder to cover your face and put some weight on your punch. Roll to evade the oponents anser. Combine them so the opponent wont see the punches coming

exercises.title: straight right -jab -right hook -roll
exercises.explanation: Dont over extend the elbow, use ur shoulder to cover your face and put some weight on your punch. Combine them so the opponent wont see the punches coming. Roll to evade the oponents anser

exercises.title: jab -straight right -slip -straight right
exercises.explanation: Dont over extend the elbow, use ur shoulder to cover your face and put some weight on your punch. Slip to evade the oponents anser and get some weight on your punch. Combine them so the opponent wont see the punches coming

exercises.title: jab -straight right -slip -straight right -roll
exercises.explanation: Dont over extend the elbow, use ur shoulder to cover your face and put some weight on your punch.  Slip and Roll to evade the oponents anser and get some weight on your punch.Combine them so the opponent wont see the punches coming

exercises.title: jab -straight right -slip -straight right -roll -straight right
exercises.explanation: Dont over extend the elbow, use ur shoulder to cover your face and put some weight on your punch. Combine them so the opponent wont see the punches coming

exercises.title: jab -straight right -slip -straight right -left hook
exercises.explanation: Dont over extend the elbow, use ur shoulder to cover your face and put some weight on your punch. Combine them so the opponent wont see the punches coming

exercises.title: jab -straight right -slip -straight right -left hook -roll
exercises.explanation: Dont over extend the elbow, use ur shoulder to cover your face and put some weight on your punch. Combine them so the opponent wont see the punches coming

exercises.title: jab -straight right -left hook -roll -roll -straight right
exercises.explanation: COver the straight punc with your soulder. Dont over extend the elbow, use ur shoulder to cover your face and put some weight on your punch. Combine them so the opponent wont see the punches coming
